content.text:
# NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Talk Series

}}
This article lists the winners and nominees for the NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Talk Series. The award was created during the 2008 ceremony after being separated from the Outstanding News/Information â€“ Series or Special category. Currently Red Table Talk, Steve Harvey and The View hold the record for most wins in this category with three each.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold.
